alert.note: Alert for Carbon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 9:40PM EST until March 11 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Sussex, Warren and Morris. In Pennsylvania, Carbon. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There may be a lull in the snow for a time into the overnight hours, then additional snow is expected Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
